ambientLighting.title: Ambient Lighting Settings
ambientLighting.description: Settings for the Ambient Lighting module

ledState.label: LED State
ledState.description: Sets LED to on or off

current.label: Natężenie
current.description: Sets the current for the LED output. Default is 10

red.label: Czerwony
red.description: Sets the red LED level. Values are 0-255

green.label: Zielony
green.description: Sets the green LED level. Values are 0-255

blue.label: Niebieski
blue.description: Sets the blue LED level. Values are 0-255

pttPin.label: PTT Pin
pttPin.description: GPIO pin to use for PTT

bitrate.label: Bitrate
bitrate.description: Bitrate to use for audio encoding

i2sWs.label: i2S WS
i2sWs.description: GPIO pin to use for i2S WS

i2sSd.label: i2S SD
i2sSd.description: GPIO pin to use for i2S SD

i2sDin.label: i2S DIN
i2sDin.description: GPIO pin to use for i2S DIN

i2sSck.label: i2S SCK
i2sSck.description: GPIO pin to use for i2S SCK

cannedMessage.title: Canned Message Settings
cannedMessage.description: Settings for the Canned Message module

inputbrokerPinA.label: Encoder Pin A
inputbrokerPinA.description: GPIO Pin Value (1-39) For encoder port A

inputbrokerPinB.label: Encoder Pin B
inputbrokerPinB.description: GPIO Pin Value (1-39) For encoder port B

inputbrokerPinPress.label: Encoder Pin Press
inputbrokerPinPress.description: GPIO Pin Value (1-39) For encoder Press

sendBell.label: Send Bell
sendBell.description: Sends a bell character with each message

detectionSensor.title: Detection Sensor Settings
detectionSensor.description: Settings for the Detection Sensor module

enabled.label: Włączony
enabled.description: Enable or disable Detection Sensor Module

minimumBroadcastSecs.label: Minimum Broadcast Seconds
minimumBroadcastSecs.description: The interval in seconds of how often we can send a message to the mesh when a state change is detected

stateBroadcastSecs.label: State Broadcast Seconds
stateBroadcastSecs.description: The interval in seconds of how often we should send a message to the mesh with the current state regardless of changes

sendBell.label: Send Bell
sendBell.description: Send ASCII bell with alert message

name.label: Friendly Name
name.description: Used to format the message sent to mesh, max 20 Characters

monitorPin.label: Monitor Pin
monitorPin.description: The GPIO pin to monitor for state changes

detectionTriggerType.label: Detection Triggered Type
detectionTriggerType.description: The type of trigger event to be used

usePullup.label: Use Pullup
usePullup.description: Whether or not use INPUT_PULLUP mode for GPIO pin

alertBell.label: Alert Bell
alertBell.description: Should an alert be triggered when receiving an incoming bell?

useI2sAsBuzzer.label: Use I²S Pin as Buzzer
useI2sAsBuzzer.description: Designate I²S Pin as Buzzer Output

address.label: MQTT Server Address
address.description: MQTT server address to use for default/custom servers

username.label: MQTT Username
username.description: MQTT username to use for default/custom servers

password.label: MQTT Password
password.description: MQTT password to use for default/custom servers

encryptionEnabled.label: Encryption Enabled
encryptionEnabled.description: Enable or disable MQTT encryption. Note: All messages are sent to the MQTT broker unencrypted if this option is not enabled, even when your uplink channels have encryption keys set. This includes position data.

jsonEnabled.label: JSON Enabled
jsonEnabled.description: Whether to send/consume JSON packets on MQTT

root.label: Root topic
root.description: MQTT root topic to use for default/custom servers

proxyToClientEnabled.label: MQTT Client Proxy Enabled
proxyToClientEnabled.description: Utilizes the network connection to proxy MQTT messages to the client.

mapReportingEnabled.label: Map Reporting Enabled
mapReportingEnabled.description: Your node will periodically send an unencrypted map report packet to the configured MQTT server, this includes id, short and long name, approximate location, hardware model, role, firmware version, LoRa region, modem preset and primary channel name.

publishIntervalSecs.label: Map Report Publish Interval (s)
publishIntervalSecs.description: Interval in seconds to publish map reports

positionPrecision.label: Approximate Location
positionPrecision.description: Position shared will be accurate within this distance

neighborInfo.title: Neighbor Info Settings
neighborInfo.description: Settings for the Neighbor Info module

enabled.label: Włączony
enabled.description: Enable or disable Neighbor Info Module

updateInterval.label: Update Interval
updateInterval.description: Interval in seconds of how often we should try to send our Neighbor Info to the mesh

paxcounterUpdateInterval.label: Update Interval (seconds)
paxcounterUpdateInterval.description: How long to wait between sending paxcounter packets

wifiThreshold.label: WiFi RSSI Threshold
wifiThreshold.description: At what WiFi RSSI level should the counter increase. Defaults to -80.

bleThreshold.label: BLE RSSI Threshold
bleThreshold.description: At what BLE RSSI level should the counter increase. Defaults to -80.

rangeTest.title: Range Test Settings
rangeTest.description: Settings for the Range Test module

sender.label: Message Interval
sender.description: How long to wait between sending test packets

echo.label: Echo
echo.description: Any packets you send will be echoed back to your device

rxd.label: Receive Pin
rxd.description: Set the GPIO pin to the RXD pin you have set up.

txd.label: Transmit Pin
txd.description: Set the GPIO pin to the TXD pin you have set up.

timeout.label: Limit czasu
timeout.description: Seconds to wait before we consider your packet as 'done'

overrideConsoleSerialPort.label: Override Console Serial Port
overrideConsoleSerialPort.description: If you have a serial port connected to the console, this will override it.

storeForward.title: Store & Forward Settings
storeForward.description: Settings for the Store & Forward module

historyReturnMax.label: History return max
historyReturnMax.description: Max number of records to return

historyReturnWindow.label: History return window
historyReturnWindow.description: Return records from this time window (minutes)

environmentScreenEnabled.label: Displayed on Screen
environmentScreenEnabled.description: Show the Telemetry Module on the OLED

airQualityInterval.label: Air Quality Update Interval
airQualityInterval.description: How often to send Air Quality data over the mesh

powerUpdateInterval.label: Power Update Interval
powerUpdateInterval.description: How often to send Power data over the mesh
